recommendations.description: Scene "The Cryo Lab" has a very low pass rate on skill checks.
recommendations.suggestion: Consider lowering DCs or adding alternative paths for failed checks.

recommendations.suggestion: Consider adding more variety between action, social, and exploration scenes.

details.text: Jax navigates the perimeter without hesitation. He knows exactly where the blind spots are. How?
Jax stares at the photos. His hands are shaking. He won't meet your eyes.
Jax shouts: 'Don't kill them! Just knock them down! We aren't butchers!'
Jax stares at the body. He freezes. 'I told you... I told you to stop.' He takes Mental Stress.
The Hazers are unconscious. Jax checks a pulse and sighs in relief. 'Good. Let's move.'
